W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: A world riddled with countless visions. Will it be possible to acquire a spirit's power in a place like this?

W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_DETAIL.text: A world riddled with countless visions. Could there be one among them that will guide you to the truth?

W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_EXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_EXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Return to the Heavens and search for your next destination.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_EXIT_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_VISION_EXIT_100_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head to the Heavens, then return to Miyako City.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_EASY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_EASY_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a weak fire spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_NORMAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_NORMAL_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a normal fire spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_HARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_HARD_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a strong fire spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KA_VH_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a sinister fire spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_EASY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_EASY_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a weak metal spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_NORMAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_NORMAL_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a normal metal spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_HARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_HARD_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a strong metal spirit.

W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W14_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_VH_000_DETAIL.text: You see a vision of a sinister metal spirit.
